title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: One question when you look the news specially trump times stock market up everything seems to to be fine.But yet there is so much homeless people and many other problems how the usa still have capability and powrr to be world police and same time handle the situation in usa.In europe people live much better lets compare the usa regular middle class to eu ones.Yet the usa preseting himself as the wealthy good american dream country but there is huge homeless problem in there its a big one.But other world see the usa as the leader as the example How the usa have kept the position like this ?

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Some people in the world are psychotically ambitious. They form governments and police the world for their own profit.If they were strong enough to have real control, they would send in government killers to kill off the homeless who litter the streets with themselves and their feces. Then they would execute the old people who are living off society via Social Security.There are two reasons shy they would do this, and why they are pushing as hard as they can to get themselves into this position. Guess what the reasons are.

comments.author: 81coin
comments.body: It's a great great queston how USA keeeps this posotion. Once I met some girls from the USA in Italy and they were shoked that actually people in europe live good lives, sometimes even better than in the USA

comments.author: ammodotcom
comments.body: The United States government may make gestures that it cares about the homeless population and other social issues, but these do not deter it from its agenda to profit from war.
